Face of God.quote: "No one can see my face and live." (Exodus 33:20)

Divine Countenance.quote: "The Lord make His face shine upon you and be gracious to you." (Numbers 6:25)

Divine Appearance.quote: "His face shone like the sun, and his clothes became as white as light." (Matthew 17:2)

Divine Vision.quote: "Blessed are the pure in heart, for they shall see God." (Matthew 5:8)

Divine Features.quote: "His eyes were like blazing fire, and on his head were many crowns." (Revelation 19:12)

Divine Gaze.quote: "The eyes of the Lord are in every place, keeping watch on the evil and the good." (Proverbs 15:3)

Divine Form.quote: "The form of the Lord is beyond description, yet His face is seen everywhere." (Brahma Samhita 5.38)

Divine Beauty.quote: "One thing I ask from the Lord... to gaze upon the beauty of the Lord." (Psalm 27:4)

Divine Light.quote: "God is light, and in Him there is no darkness at all." (1 John 1:5)

Divine Expression.quote: "The light of Your face has shone upon us, O Lord." (Psalm 4:6)

Divine Reflection.quote: "We all, with unveiled face, beholding the glory of the Lord, are being transformed." (2 Corinthians 3:18)

Divine Radiance.quote: "His face was like the sun shining in all its brilliance." (Revelation 1:16)

Divine Veils.quote: "Moses put a veil over his face because its radiance was fading." (2 Corinthians 3:13)

Divine Recognition.quote: "Now I know in part; then I shall know fully, even as I am fully known." (1 Corinthians 13:12)

Divine Aspects of Face.quote: "Each face will be radiant, looking towards their Lord." (Quran 75:22-23)

Divine Manifestation in Face.quote: "In His face all the divine attributes are perfectly displayed." (Ibn Arabi)

Divine Facial Features.quote: "His appearance was so marred, beyond human semblance." (Isaiah 52:14)

Divine Smile.quote: "May God smile on us and bless us." (Psalm 67:1)

Divine Eyes.quote: "The eyes of the Ancient of Days were like flaming torches." (Daniel 7:9)

Divine Mouth.quote: "From his mouth came a sharp sword." (Revelation 19:15)

Divine Visibility.quote: "Though now you do not see Him, yet believing, you rejoice." (1 Peter 1:8)

Divine Face Hiding.quote: "How long will You hide Your face from me?" (Psalm 13:1)

Divine Face Blessing.quote: "Make Your face shine upon Your servant." (Psalm 31:16)

Divine Face Transformation.quote: "Those who look to Him are radiant." (Psalm 34:5)

Divine Face Recognition.quote: "Face to face I have seen God." (Genesis 32:30)

Divine Face Revelation.quote: "When He appears, we shall be like Him, for we shall see Him as He is." (1 John 3:2)
